entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then clearing. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h then west 50 gusting to 80 near noon. Temperature steady near plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning before morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
